docs.lead_paragraph: Cristie Kerr, No. 1 in the world, faces the conundrum that caused Annika Sorenstam and Lorena Ochoa to retire: focus on golf or start a family?

headline.seo: Golf and Motherhood on Conflicting Courses
headline.main: Golf and Motherhood on Conflicting Courses
headline.print_headline: Being a Parent or a Star: 2 Fast-Closing Windows

docs.lead_paragraph: A new law allowing abortion without restrictions in the first 14 weeks of pregnancy went into effect on Monday, but the Constitutional Court could intervene to suspend or change it.

headline.main: Spain: Looser Restrictions on Abortion Take Effect
headline.print_headline: Spain: Looser Restrictions On Abortion Take Effect

docs.snippet: A new law allowing abortion without restrictions in the first 14 weeks of pregnancy went into effect on Monday, but the Constitutional Court could intervene to suspend or change it.

docs.lead_paragraph: A father’s message about family, responsibility and his own decisions seems clear, but his daughter’s understanding of it changes over time.

headline.seo: Tethered by a Pregnancy, But Choosing to Stay
headline.main: The Tangle of Biology and Choice
headline.print_headline: The Tangle of Biology and Choice

docs.lead_paragraph: "The Apprentice" is coming back to Thursday nights on NBC, this time after an entire show was fired.

headline.main: At NBC, 'Love' Takes a Break and 'The Apprentice' Steps In

docs.abstract: "The Apprentice" is coming back to Thursday nights on NBC, replacing the delayed "Love Bites."
docs.snippet: "The Apprentice" is coming back to Thursday nights on NBC, replacing the delayed "Love Bites."
